query: What are the most popular movies (IMDb rating > 8) from the 1990s and who directed them?
response: MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre) WHERE m.released_year >= 1990 AND m.released_year < 2000 AND m.imdb_rating > 8 RETURN d.name AS Director, m.title AS Movie, m.imdb_rating AS IMDb_Rating

query: List all action and drama movies with a runtime between 120 and 180 minutes sorted by IMDb rating
response: MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Action'}) WHERE m.runtime >= 120 AND m.runtime <= 180 RETURN m.title, m.imdb_rating ORDER BY m.imdb_rating DESC

query: Find movies where Brad Pitt and Christopher Nolan collaborated
response: MATCH (a:Actor {name: 'Brad Pitt'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director {name: 'Christopher Nolan'}) RETURN m

query: Find all movies starring both Leonardo DiCaprio and Christopher Nolan
response: MATCH (a:Actor {name: 'Leonardo DiCaprio'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director {name: 'Christopher Nolan'}) RETURN m

query: List all fantasy movies directed by Peter Jackson with an IMDb rating greater than 7
response: MATCH (d:Director {name: 'Peter Jackson'})-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Fantasy'}) WHERE m.imdb_rating > 7 RETURN m

query: Find all movies with more than 500
response: 000 votes and an IMDb rating below 6.5
column5: MATCH (m:Movie)-[:ACTED_IN]->(a:Actor)-[:DIRECTED]->(d:Director) WHERE m.no_of_votes > 500000 AND m.imdb_rating < 6.5 RETURN d.name AS DirectorName

query: What are the genres Robert De Niro has acted in most frequently?
response: MATCH (a:Actor {name: 'Robert De Niro'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre) RETURN g.name AS Genre, COUNT(m) AS Frequency ORDER BY Frequency DESC

query: Find all movies released between 2005 and 2015
response: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.released_year >= 2005 AND m.released_year <= 2015 RETURN m

query: List all action and thriller movies with a runtime less than 100 minutes
response: MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Action'})-[:IN_GENRE]->(g2:Genre {name: 'Thriller'}) WHERE m.runtime < 100 RETURN m.title, m.imdb_rating

query: Find all movies directed by Martin Scorsese
response: MATCH (d:Director {name: 'Martin Scorsese'})-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) RETURN m

query: What are the most popular comedy movies with an IMDb rating above 7?
response: MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Comedy'}) WHERE m.imdb_rating > 7 RETURN m.title, m.imdb_rating

query: Find movies where Tom Hanks and Steven Spielberg collaborated
response: MATCH (a:Actor {name: 'Tom Hanks'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director {name: 'Steven Spielberg'}) RETURN m

query: List all horror movies from 1980 to 1990
response: MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre {name: 'Horror'}) WHERE m.released_year >= 1980 AND m.released_year <= 1990 RETURN m.title, m.released_year

query: Find the highest-rated movies (IMDb rating > 8) directed by Stanley Kubrick
response: MATCH (d:Director {name: 'Stanley Kubrick'})-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie) WHERE m.imdb_rating > 8 RETURN m.title, m.imdb_rating

query: Find all movies featuring both Will Smith and Martin Lawrence
response: MATCH (a1:Actor {name: 'Will Smith'})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(a2:Actor {name: 'Martin Lawrence'}) RETURN m

query: Find all movies with an IMDb rating above 9 from the 2000s
response: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.released_year >= 2000 AND m.released_year < 2010 AND m.imdb_rating > 9 RETURN m.title, m.imdb_rating
